about_the_game:
Constantine Scores is a single-player heisting first-person shooter. Set in the Year 2375, you work as a freelance agent, handling contracts for the United Earth Federation. As a mercenary, you fight against three factions in short contracts or randomized campaigns.

Sent alone you must complete the objectives given to you by the director. With a contractor to help guide you in your missions. Upgrade your arsenal to gain more abilities, weapons, and perks to keep the playing field equal.

Player Customization

Players can customize their agent using the credits they earn from missions.

  • Weapons such as your primary, secondary, and melee. 

  • Augmentations that give special perks.

  • Armors that give different stat boots.

  • Alternative attacks utilizing a shoulder cannon.

  • Abilities that give passive boosts when activated.

  • Drones that assist in combat.

  • Operator Ranks are a prestige system that gives rewards.

Contracts

Contracts are short, replayable single-day missions. Fourteen missions will be available on launch. Each contract has randomization, including layout and objective location changes. Each mission pits you against one of the three factions and can only be completed by going loud.

Campaigns

Campaigns are randomized multi-day contracts, utilizing solo contract missions and shuffling them to form a mini-campaign. This allows players to experience missions back-to-back in a random order that escalates from smaller missions to larger ones. On launch, you can expect to play three to five-day campaigns.

Factions

  • Constantines Empire. Constantine was a rogue military general turned emperor. Uniting many disgruntled colonies to join the Empire, with an ambition to consolidate his power in the galaxy. Considered a main priority threat to the United Earth Federation.

  • Orion Cartel. An underground syndicate ruled by five families. They operate in the Constantine System. They are rapidly militarizing, and controlling the black market in the galaxy. Considered a secondary priority threat to the United Earth Federation. 

  • Syn Corporation. A security and research company. They provide valuable technology to Constantines Empire, in return for autonomy to work in their systems. Considered a tertiary priority threat to the United Earth Federation.

content_descriptors.notes: Constantine Scores contains cartoonish representations of general acts of violence, such as shooting guns or using melee weapons and cartoonish blood impacts. Missions involve general acts of robbery and the game includes settings to keep corpses around or have them vanish. Generic references to drugs, though nondescript. Inclusion of Low Poly NPCs that represent criminal or mature content, such as prostitutes, gangsters, strippers, and drug producers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600, Intel Core i5-10400, Intel Core i5-12400F, Ryzen 5600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960, r9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60FPS Low-Medium Settings

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7600x, Intel Core I5-13600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060, RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p-1440p 60FPS+ Max Settings

short_description: Constantine Scores is a single-player heisting Sci-fi First Person Shooter. Upgrade your arsenal to gain more abilities, weapons, and perks to keep the playing field equal. Fight against three separate factions, spanning multiple contracts, and randomized multi-day campaigns.
